172.title: John Carter
notes:
Science fiction features published under various slightly different feature titles, grouped here chronologically. These stories are features in several different titles, including
  • John Carter of Mars
  • John Carter Warlord of Mars
  • Tarzan
  • Weird Worlds
The stories are adapted from or based on the works of Edgar Rice Burroughs, and take place on the planet Barsoom. See also Carter, John.
